## STAPLE Metadata

### Project

Required elements of project-level metadata:

-   Name of the project
-   Project description
-   Authors
    -   Corresponding Author
-   Citation
    -   Persistent identifier (DOI)
-   Subject/keywords
-   Funders
-   Date

https://schema.org/ResearchProject
